app.title: Impostor
app.subtitle: Online Game
app.game-rules.rules: Create a room or join an existing one.
Start the game when all players are present.
The app randomly designates one player as the impostor and selects the secret word.
Each player gives a clue word over 2 rounds.
At the end of the 2 rounds, the players discuss and vote to identify the impostor.
If the impostor is found, they can reveal the secret word they think they have discovered.
app.game-rules.principle.title: Game Principles
app.game-rules.principle.principles: Each player knows a secret word except for the impostor.
Each player takes turns giving a clue word related to the secret word.
Players must identify the impostor, and the impostor must remain undetected while trying to guess the secret word.
app.game-rules.title: Rules
